channel.title: I think this is not too hard to answer
channel.description:
How can i do that when u press on an NPC, it asks: "Do you want to buy beer?" And that when u press "no", conversation gets closed, but that when u press "Yes", 2 coins go away of ur inventory and u get a beer. And when u don't got enough, the NPC says: "You don't have enough gold" en then when u press next, conversation gets closed.
And, please give me the right code. Before this one, someone else gaved me a wrong code, and me server got f*cked up. Couldn't compile. But luckily, i could delete the codes, and me server got fine.
And if u need this: Im using 317 HomieScape!!
And please give me the CODE and don't tell that it is something with dialogues. So can someone give me the code and tell me where i need to enter it in please?

item.title: I think this is not too hard to answer
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:8, topic:330336”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=426720.msg3134084#msg3134084 date=1266766470]
I really don’t want to start an argument, but you sir are very wrong. “It has never been done before.”
[/quote]

Don’t want to start an argument either, but has it really been done before? I asked this question a while ago, and was told it was not done before…
Could you link me to this server programmed in C++? I would like to see it for myself.[/quote]

Noone else in the world has the Frugooscape source, I speak for myself.

Read full topic
item.source: I think this is not too hard to answer

item.title: I think this is not too hard to answer
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:6, topic:330336”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=426720.msg3134077#msg3134077 date=1266766268]
Delta is a failure of a source, first of all you want to actually call your server “work” use Dodian, or atleast reprogram your server to a new computer language such as the famous c++…

Homiescape can’t take rep either.
[/quote]

I was referring to the tutorial >_>.
I know Delta sucks, but most people use it. That’s why I used it for my tutorial.

Also, good luck reprogramming your server to C++. It has not been done before.[/quote]

I really don’t want to start an argument, but you sir are very wrong. “It has never been done before.”

Read full topic
